item.title: Building Better Apps with GitHub Copilot Custom Agents
item.description: Custom agents are here to customize and optimize how coding agents work on your code, here is my experiment with the WinForms agent. Link to article: https://montemagno.com/building-better-apps-with-github-copilot-custom-agents/
